title: Agate snail
data:
{{obsolete}} {{list of|gastropods}} {{monster |name=agate snail |glyph={{LightGreen|j}} |tile=[[File:Agate snail.png]] |flags={{No skeleton flag}} |resistances={{Drown resistance}} |vulnerabilities=None |max_chunks=5 |meat={{Poisonous corpse}} |xp=83 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=56 |hp_range=78-105 |avg_hp=91 |armour_class=7 |evasion=2 |habitat=Amphibious |speed= 4 |size={{Large}} |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1=18 ({{Bite type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=14 |base_hp=5 |extra_hp=3 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{Insect intelligence}} |genus=giant slug |species=agate snail }} {{Flavour|A huge and disgusting gastropod with a celadon shell, inside which it will hide when frightened. ---- “Snail, snail, slug-slow,
To me thy four horns show;
If thou dost not show me thy four,
I will throw thee out of the door,
For the crow in the gutter,
To eat for bread and butter.”
-Silesian rhyme, _Notes and Queries_, Number 69. 1851}} ==Useful Info== '''Agate snails''' are slow, lumbering hulks which deal moderate damage and have a tough protective shell, but move and act at less than half average speed. When badly injured, it will [[withdrawn|withdraw]] into its shell, granting it +10 [[AC]] and [[regeneration]] but rendering it harmless and stationary. They can be found in [[the Lair]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *Before they've withdrawn into their shell, any character can easily [[kite]] them to death. Even flimsy characters with decent weapons should be able to finish them off safely after they withdraw. ==History== Agate snails were removed in [[0.14]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
